PACKHELP.text:
TPACK and TUNPACK

Recently I needed to save space in my MVS dasds and I was using
TRSMAIN utility. In most of cases I submitted some JCLs.
After a lot of submition I used my know-how in REXX language and
developed two small tools. Basically TPACK and TUNPACK, just a front-end
for this utility.

This utility uses some information included in TERSE dataset header.
Checking header data I can define what will be the DSORG and RECFM for
output untersed file.

Both tools can be used informing just one parameter and they invoke
TRSMAIN utility. (please, change the current library if different!)
For TPACK, you can use TPACK 'indataset' 'outdataset'
For TUNPACK, you can use TUNPACK 'indataset' 'outdataset'

This tool can be interesting when you use with ISPF option 3.4,
in order to don't forget to concat in SYSPROC.

Sample :

   Menu  Options  View  Utilities  Compilers  Help
 sssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss
 DSLIST - Data Sets Matching SYS1
 Command ===>                                                  Scr

 Command - Enter "/" to select action                  Message
 -----------------------------------------------------------------
 tpack    SYS1.CIDTABL
   or     SYS1.CLIST
 tunpack  SYS1.CMDLIB
          SYS1.COB2LIB
          SYS1.COMMDS

Daniel Gaeta
dfgaeta@br.ibm.com

TPACK.text:
/* REXX                                                            */
/* Function  : terse a dataset with dynamic space allocation       */
/*             this version can be used in ISPF 3.4 screen         */
/*             the output tersed will have a suffix .TERSE         */
/* Parameter : PACK 'infile' -'outfile'-                           */
/* Author    : Daniel Gaeta (dfgaeta@br.ibm.com)                   */

  arg pdsni pdsno


  parse value pdsni with "'"ilib"'"
  parse value pdsno with "'"olib"'"
  address tso
  zifile=ilib
  if pdsno='' then zofile=ilib||".TERSE"
  else zofile=olib
  "alloc f(infile) da('"||zifile||"') shr reuse"
  "alloc f(sysprint) da(*)"
  "alloc f(outfile) da('"||zofile||"') new unit(sysda) recfm(f) ",
    "lrecl(1024) blksize(0)"
  "call 'sys1.local.linklib(trsmain)' 'PACK'"
  "free f(infile)"
  "free f(outfile)"

exit

TUNPACK.text:
/* REXX                                                            */
/* Function  : unterse a dataset with dynamic space allocation     */
/*             this version can be used in ISPF 3.4 screen         */
/*             the output untersed will have a suffix .UNTERSE     */
/* Parameter : UNPACK 'infile' -'outfile'-                         */
/* Author    : Daniel Gaeta (dfgaeta@br.ibm.com)                   */

  arg pdsni pdsno
  parse value pdsni with "'"ilib"'"
  parse value pdsno with "'"olib"'"
  suf=0
  zifile=ilib
  if index(ilib,'.TERSE')>0 then do
     ilib=substr(ilib,1,index(ilib,'.TERSE')-1)
     suf=1
  end
  address tso
  if pdsno='' then
     zofile=ilib||'.UNTERSE'
  else zofile=olib
  zrc=listdsi("'"||zifile||"'")
  newpri=sysprimary*3
  "alloc f(infile) da('"||zifile||"') shr reuse"
  "execio 1 diskr infile (stem ldata."
  "alloc f(sysprint) da(*)"
  bytect=substr(ldata.1,1,1)
  bytell=x2d(c2x(substr(ldata.1,3,2)))
  byteds=substr(ldata.1,2,1)
  if byteds='01'x then do
     bytell=bytell+4
  end
  if bytect='07'x then do
     "alloc f(outfile) da('"||zofile||"') new catalog unit(sysda)",
     "dsorg(po) lrecl("bytell") ",
     "dir(30) space("newpri")"
  end
  if bytect='02'x then do
     "alloc f(outfile) da('"||zofile||"') new catalog unit(sysda) ",
     "dsorg(ps) lrecl("bytell")"
  end
  "call 'sys1.local.linklib(trsmain)' 'UNPACK'"
  "free f(infile)"
  "free f(outfile)"

exit
